ComicInfo.Title: Volume 1
ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Villains Micro-Series
ComicInfo.Summary: Krang, Baxter Stockman, Old Hob, and Alopex all get their turn. Krang's history is revealed, Baxter's secret project may be more dangerous than he realized, Old Hob is ready to branch out on his own, and Alopex discovers a devastating truth about her past.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 11:41:25. [CVDB433209]
ComicInfo.Writer: Brian Lynch, Erik Burnham, Jason Ciaramella, Joshua Williamson
ComicInfo.Penciller: Andy Kuhn, Dave Wachter, Mike Henderson, Sophie Campbell
ComicInfo.Inker: Andy Kuhn, Dave Wachter, Mike Henderson, Sophie Campbell
ComicInfo.Colorist: Heather Nunnelly, Ian Herring, John Rauch, Sophie Campbell
ComicInfo.Letterer: Chris Mowry, Shawn Lee, Tom B. Long
ComicInfo.Editor: Alonzo Simon, Bobby Curnow, Justin Eisinger
ComicInfo.Characters: Alopex, Baxter Stockman, Bebop, Donatello, Fugitoid, Karai, Krang, Leonardo, Master Splinter, Michelangelo, Mouser, Old Hob, Quanin, Raphael, Rocksteady, Sergeant Granitor, Shredder, Slash, Traag, Traxus
ComicInfo.Teams: Flyborgs, Foot Clan, Rock Soldiers, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Utroms
ComicInfo.Locations: Alaska, Burnow Island, Dimension X, Earth, Morbus, New York City, New York State, North America, Space, Stock Gen Laboratories
